author: carlos
msg: Fixed MPLINKCHECK-15. Use BufferedInputStream in FileToCheck

author: vmassol
msg: Added new maven.abbot.extrajars property that can be used to specify extra jars to be added to the executing classpath. For example, this is useful to add custom Abbot tester classes.

author: evenisse
msg: Add the possibility to set multiple includes and excludes files for instrumentation.

author: vmassol
msg: Refactoring: all jars to include in the generated JNLP are now signed in the maven.abbot.dest.jar.dir and the JNLP generation logic scans all jars in this directory for inclusion

author: carlos
msg: Added dt css style. Fixes MPFAQ-11
